data string after padding : Hello World!~~~~
plain text with padding is : Hello World!~~~~
01001000011001010110110001101100011011110010000001010111011011110111001001101100011001000010000101111110011111100111111001111110


Printing 64bit block 
0100100001100101011011000110110001101111001000000101011101101111

out of generate key

00110101100011111011001110101010


................ after passing 32 bits through P BOX : 10 ..............
10101001011000100111011111010011


leftmost 32 bit
01111011111100000011111000101001


XOR-ed P box val with leftmost 32 bit
11010010100010110100100011010110


previous leftmost 32 bit of itr 10
01111011111100000011111000101001


previous rightmost 32 bit of itr 10
11010010100010110100100011010110


.................. DECRYPTION ITERATION 11.................. 


Data block 
1001111000001101000001000101011000111110001100101010111010101010


expanded 48 bits 
011010100101010001010110101001010001011010101101


K_I 
111100001010011001110110100001010000000000011111


XOR-ed K_I and expanded 48 bit
100110101111001000100000001000000001011010110010

01001000010100011110100000001001


................ after passing 32 bits through P BOX : 11 ..............
10011101000011011000100010000000


leftmost 32 bit
11010010100010110100100011010110

1001111000001101000001000101011000111110001100101010111010101010

101101010001010010011000001010001100100100011001

00010111100001001000110000100101

.................. DECRYPTION ITERATION 15.................. 


Data block 
1001111000001101000001000101011000111110001100101010111010101010


expanded 48 bits 
100000000001011111111111111110100101011110100010


K_I 
110000001011111001100110100100101010000100010000

010000001010100110011001011010001111011010110010


shortening xor result - Sample 32 bits from the result according to PI_2 array
11001000101000000100111000111010


................ after passing 32 bits through P BOX : 15 ..............
00011010101011101000010100001100


leftmost 32 bit
00000000111111111111001011110001

11110111111100011111011000001000


previous leftmost 32 bit of itr 15
00000000111111111111001011110001


previous rightmost 32 bit of itr 15
11110111111100011111011000001000


data block after 16 iterations and swapping
1111011111110001111101100000100000000000111111111111001011110001

decryption: 

after transposing with PI_1
0111001001101100011001000010000101111110011111100111111001111110
in binaryStringTOText 
received binary string : 
0111001001101100011001000010000101111110011111100111111001111110
Plain_text with/without Padding: rld!~~~~

decrypted plain_text: rld!    
rld!    
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ rld!     ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~



~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ DECRYPTION OF BLOCK 1 ENDS ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
